An angiogram can help your doctor confirm whether you have varicose veins or another condition.",NHLBI,Varicose Veins
What are the treatments for Varicose Veins ?,"Varicose veins are treated with lifestyle changes and medical procedures. The goals of treatment are to relieve symptoms, prevent complications, and improve appearance.
